message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $12,000. It's a great deal considering its value to you. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. That's the most I'm willing to pay for the product.
Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, but $9,000 is just too low. I'm willing to come down a bit, but $10,000 is the lowest I can go.  Let's see if we can reach a compromise.
I appreciate your willingness to come down to $10,000, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'd be willing to pay $8,500 for the product. Let's see if we can meet in the middle.

Bob, I understand your situation, but $8,500 just doesn't work for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $9,500. It's a fair price considering the value of the product to you.  Let's make this deal happen!
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. How about we try $9,250? That's the most I can afford.
